Function Documentation

bool getModes ( cmd_word *  word,
mode *  destMode,
mode *  sourceMode 
)

Computes the destination and source adressing modes from a command word.

Parameters:
word the command word from which to compute adressing modes
sourceMode pointer to the source mode variable to set
destMode pointer to the destination mode variable to set
Returns:
false if the given modes are illegal
